content.prompt: Which of the following would most directly support the authorâ€™s argument in the third paragraph?

choices.label: The civil war in Yugoslavia that led to the breakup of that country
The peaceful separation of Czechoslovakia into two separate countries, both of which joined the European Union
The failure of Great Britain and Norway to join the currency union of the European Union
The financial crisis in Greece and Spain that required bailouts from German and other European banks

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
